scripts.coverage: FEES=20:1 yarn build && FEES=20:1 hardhat coverage --temp artifacts
scripts.flatten: FEES=20:1 hardhat flatten contracts/BullToken.sol | grep -v SPDX > ./BullToken.flat.sol
scripts.deploy:shld:ropsten: FEES=20:1 hardhat deployUpgradeableContract --contract-name ShieldToken --constructor-args-module tasks/arguments/ShieldToken.test.arguments.ts --cache-key rebrand --network ropsten
scripts.upgrade:coli:ropsten: FEES=35:1 hardhat upgradeContract --contract-name ColiToken --cache-key rebrand --network ropsten
scripts.upgrade:coli:mainnet: FEES=60:2 hardhat upgradeContract --contract-name ColiToken --cache-key rebrand --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:busd:bsctestnet: FEES=20:1 hardhat deployNonUpgradeableContract --contract-name GenericToken --constructor-args-module tasks/arguments/BinanceUSD.arguments.ts --network bsctestnet
scripts.rebrand:writeClaims:mainnet: FEES=5:1 DEBUG=app:* hardhat --show-stack-traces writeClaims --network mainnet --rewrites ~/rebrand/rewrites.csv --expectations test/expectations/writeClaims.rebrand.ts --out ~/rebrand/claims.json --cache-key rebrand
scripts.rebrand:writeClaimsToZero:mainnet: FEES=5:1 DEBUG=app:* hardhat --show-stack-traces writeClaimsToZero --network mainnet --rewrites ~/rebrand/rewrites.csv --expectations test/expectations/writeClaims.rebrand.ts --out ~/rebrand/claims.json --cache-key rebrand
scripts.rebrand:setClaims:bsctestnet:allToDeploy: FEES=20:1 DEBUG=app:* hardhat --show-stack-traces setClaims --network bsctestnet --claims test/fixtures/claims.allToDeployer.json --cache-key rebrand
scripts.rebrand:setClaims:bsctestnet: FEES=20:1 DEBUG=app:* hardhat --show-stack-traces setClaims --network bsctestnet --claims ~/rebrand/claims.json --cache-key rebrand
scripts.rebrand:setClaims:bscmainnet: FEES=5:1 DEBUG=app:* hardhat --show-stack-traces setClaims --network bscmainnet --claims ~/rebrand/claims.json --cache-key rebrand
scripts.rebrand:claimMany:bsctestnet: FEES=20:1 DEBUG=app:* hardhat --show-stack-traces claimMany --network bsctestnet --claims test/fixtures/claims.csv
scripts.rebrand:deployColiToken:bsctestnet: FEES=20:1 DEBUG=app:* hardhat --show-stack-traces deployColiToken --network bsctestnet --from-network mainnet --allocations ~/shield-contracts-data/Shield\ Frozen\ Wallets\ -\ Wallets.csv --expectations test/expectations/deployColiToken.rebrand.ts --cache-key rebrand
